```coq
Proof.
intros net HR IR.
unfold commit_recorded_committed in IR.
destruct IR as [H].
apply msg_lower_prop_all_the_way in HR.
apply msg_simulation_1 in HR.
unfold commit_recorded_committed in HR.
rewrite <- HR.
apply msg_lower_prop_all_the_way.
assumption.
Qed.

original: intros net HR IR. unfold commit_recorded_committed in IR. destruct IR as [H]. apply msg_lower_prop_all_the_way in HR. apply msg_simulation_1 in HR. unfold commit_recorded_committed in HR. rewrite <- HR. apply msg_lower_prop_all_the_way. auto.
